thread.section_title: Four teenagers arrested for gang rape of schoolgirl – Metro
thread.title: Four teenagers arrested for gang rape of schoolgirl
thread.title_full: Four teenagers arrested for gang rape of schoolgirl

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Four teenagers arrested for gang rape of schoolgirl
text:
Cloffocks car park in Workington where the alleged attack happened (Picture: Google Maps) Four teenagers have been arrested on suspicion of gang raping a schoolgirl.
Three 13-year-olds and a 14-year-old were arrested overnight and are currently facing questions from police.
Detectives are investigating rape allegations following an attack in Cloffocks, Workington.
All the boys are believed to be from the Cumbria town.
Police said: The offence is alleged to have occurred on a grassed area near Cloffocks car park in Workington at some time between 7pm and 7.20pm on Tuesday, 3 January, 2016.
‘Anyone with information about this incident who has yet to come forward is urged to call 101 quoting incident number 176 of 3 January 2016 or Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111.’
